message.content:
cs.DB, cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.DS, cs.PL. 

The paper discusses the challenges of designing and tuning specialized data system architectures, which is a core issue in the field of database systems (cs.DB). The concept of evolutionary systems also involves the use of multiple competing solutions and the selection of the fittest, which is related to the field of distributed computing (cs.DC). The paper also emphasizes the simplicity and ease of use of evolutionary systems, which is a common theme in software engineering (cs.SE). The concept of adapting to changing workloads is also related to the field of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). Finally, the paper presents a prototype that can seamlessly evolve between different database architectures, which is a topic in programming languages and compilers (cs.PL).
